data.comment: The big names in today's match at Adams Park have now been confirmed.
The whistle has gone to start the match.
In the minute 16, Alex Samuel for Wycombe has been booked by Darren Bond and receives a first yellow card.
The second-half is underway in Wycombe.
In the minute 54, Adebayo Akinfenwa is on a sub for Jason McCarthy for Wycombe.
Jordan Cousins (Stoke) has received a yellow card from Darren Bond.
James McClean is replacing Jacob Brown for Stoke at Adams Park.
In the minute 63, Gareth Ainsworth is making the team's second substitution at Adams Park with Scott Kashket replacing Alex Samuel.
Joe Jacobson is booked for the home team.
Nick Powell scores with a header and the away team now lead 0-1.
In the minute 73, James McClean (Stoke) has received a first yellow card.
Gareth Ainsworth (Wycombe) is making a third substitution, with Garath McCleary replacing Matt Bloomfield.
At Adams Park, James Chester has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 84, Stoke make their second substitution with Tashan Oakley-Boothe replacing Nick Powell.
The away team have replaced Sam Vokes with Tommy Smith. This is the third substitution made today by Michael O'Neill.
Stoke's Sam Clucas has been booked in Wycombe.
